original_text: And she brought up one of her whelps: it became a young lion, and it learned to catch the prey; it devoured men.
korean_text: 그 새끼 하나를 키우매 젊은 사자가 되어 먹이 물어뜯기를 배워 사람을 삼키매

sentences.original_text: And she brought up one of her whelps
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 그 새끼들 중 하나를 길렀고

sentences.original_text: and it learned to catch the prey
